name: Lita-info table
tagline: Lita handler for providing basic infos
body:
# lita-info_table

Just basic [Lita](http://jimmycuadra.github.io/lita/) handler as an example.

![Demo](https://github.com/roolo/lita-info_table/raw/master/demo.gif)

## Installation

Add lita-info_table to your Lita instance's Gemfile:

``` ruby
gem 'lita-info_table'
```

## Usage
If used as an IRC bot:

    7:54 PM roolo now
    7:54 PM LolLita 2013-09-03 19:54:54 +0200

## License
